revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #16 Wiki |image = [[File:Wiki.png]] |caption = Se dice que es granulosa para que los Pokémon puedan agarrarla mejor y contribuyan, así, a su diseminación. |growtime = 6m 0s |harvest = 15 bayas |replant = 30% |mutation = 0.8% |points = 45 |flavor =
*0 picante *15 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *0 ácido }} '''Wiki''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela con al menos de 25 y no más de 80 puntos secos y menos de 5 puntos de cualquier otro sabor. Se requiere haber desbloqueado la baya [[Chesto|Atania (Chesto)]] para desbloquear esta baya. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 40 seg || 3 min 30 seg || 3 min 50 seg || 6 min - 12 min |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:WikiTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores=== {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 6 min -
12 min |- ! Abono/Psydugadera | 4 min -
8 min |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Wiki_Flow_Chart.png|100px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Wiki berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- | style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |- | [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] || [[File:Chesto.png|30px]] [[Chesto]] |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Wiki berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Hondew.png|20px]] [[Hondew]] || [[File:Figy.png|20px]] [[Figy]]
[[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- | [[File:Cornn.png|20px]] [[Cornn]] || [[File:Leppa.png|20px]] [[Leppa]]
[[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]] |- | [[File:Coba.png|20px]] [[Coba]] || [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |- | [[File:Payapa.png|20px]] [[Payapa]] || [[File:Bluk.png|20px]] [[Bluk]]
[[File:Cornn.png|20px]] [[Cornn]]
[[File:Pamtre.png|20px]] [[Pamtre]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Digletts Cave|Mythic}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Pokémon Village|Common}} |} |}
